packages.glycan_conformer¶

This module contains functions to generate N-glycan conformer strings from a COLVAR file containing torsion angle values recorded over a MD simulation.

List of functions: create_binary find_min_max label_min load_dict perform_block_averages plot_distribution safe_dict

Functions

create_binary(maxima_dict, label_dict, …)

Converts torsion angle values read from COVLAR file into IUPAC letters.

find_min_max(input_dir, features, order_max, …)

Finds minima and maxima of a 1D array read from file.

label_min(cd, features, f_omega)

Function that labels minima by their corresponding IUPAC name.

load_dict(filename)

Function loading a dictionary from file.

perform_block_averages(c, ccf, store_dir)

Calculates probability of conformers for 10 separate blocks.

plot_distribution(input_dir, limit, …)

Plots a bar graph of the conformer density function.

safe_dict(dict_name, filename)

Function saving a dictionary to file.
